resource.name: Motivation and Persistence Strategies: Self-Assessment and Note-Taking Chart (Word)
resource.intro:
Besides being a self-assessment, the Motivation and Persistence Strategies chartÂ also serves as an electronic note-taking tool that you will return to periodically throughout this course and a document that you can download, save to your computer, and/or print.

Be sure to read about any strategies for which you scored yourself a 1 or a 2 in the self-assessment.
